Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.motion

Interface DirectionProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
BufferedMovable, MotionModifier, Movable, Newtonian, SceneBorderCrossingWatcher, SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicCompositeEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, MotionApplier
public interface DirectionProvider
A DirectionProvider exposes a method to acquire the direction.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default double
    getDirection()
    Get the direction in which the YaegerEntity is moving, in degrees.

  • Method Details

    • getDirection

      default double getDirection()
      Get the direction in which the YaegerEntity is moving, in degrees. If the YaegerEntity is not moving, and therefore has no direction, this method will return NaN.
      Returns:
      The direction in degrees as a double or NaN
